summary: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.
cast: Kay Kay Menon|Pavan Malhotra|Aditya Srivastav|Dibyendu Bhattacharya|Kishore Kadam|Gajraj Rao|Zakir Hussain|Somesh Agarwal|Akhilesh Tripathi|Imtiaz Ali|Raj Arjun|Ragesh Asthana|Sushovan Banerjee|Asif Basra|Aditya Bhattacharya|Uday Chandra|Raj Singh Chaudhary|Aliya Curmally|Suresh Dubey|Sanjay Gandhi|Bharat Ganeshpure|Manoj Goyal|Ashraf Ul Haq|Milind Inamdar|Pankaj Jha|Ravi Kale|Anurag Kashyap|Pratima Kazmi|Arbaaz Ali Khan|Sarfaraz Khan|Murari Kumar|Ashok Lokhande|Teddy Maurya|Vijay Maurya|Loveleen Mishra|Arindam Mitra|Vinod Nahardih|Pranay Narayan|Bobby Parvez|Sharad Ponkshe|Ajai Rohilla|Nagesh Salwan|Sujata Sehgal|Happy Sharma|Murli Sharma|Jeetendra Shastri|Jeetu Shastri|Raju Shrestha|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Savi Sidhu|Suresh Singh|Sacheen Suvarna
title: Black Friday
